username.title: Username
username.validation: Username must be at least 3 characters long and must not contain spaces or special characters

password.title: Password
password.validation: Password must have at least 8 characters, uppercase and lowercase letters, a number and a special character

entryCode.title: Entry-Code
entryCode.validation: Entry-Code must have at least 8 characters, uppercase and lowercase letters, a number and a special character
